type.description: Defines the type of this Color Generator.

oneOf.description: The colors are generated randomly from the pool.
The colors are generated based on which colors are in proximity of a Path's endpoint.

hasToExist.description: Required if type is "random". Whether in order for a color to be generated it needs to already exist on the board.
hasToExist.markdownDescription: Required if type is `"random"`. Whether in order for a color to be generated it needs to already exist on the board.

selectChance.description: Required if type is "nearEnd". The chance for a ball's color to be selected for the next generation, starting from the frontmost sphere on a randomly chosen path.
selectChance.markdownDescription: Required if type is `"nearEnd"`. The chance for a ball's color to be selected for the next generation, starting from the frontmost sphere on a randomly chosen path.

pathsInDangerOnly.description: Required if type is "nearEnd". Whether only paths in danger should be taken into account when generating colors. If no path is in danger, a random path is selected as if this was set to false.
pathsInDangerOnly.markdownDescription: Required if type is `"nearEnd"`. Whether only paths in danger should be taken into account when generating colors. If no path is in danger, a random path is selected as if this was set to `false`.

colors.description: A list of colors which can be ever generated by this generator.

fallback.description: What should be generated when this generator fails.

oneOf.description: The color to be generated when this generator fails.
Another Color Generator to be used when this generator fails.

colorsRemoveIfNonexistent.description: A list of colors which will be removed from the Shooter if no instances of that color are present on the board.
